# catchstat

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of catchstat is to provide tools and data structures that make it easier
to analyze various formats of catch data.

## Installation

You can install the the development version of catchstat from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SLU-Aqua-diadromous/catchstat")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
##library(catchstat)
## basic example code
```
